name: CyStar [DEMO]
description:
Welcome to 「 S C Y T O W N 」. 

Only here you can buy weapons at the price of a bottle of pure water.  Only here, you will realize that bullets are cheaper than a pack of chips. Only here you will see that the robots began to create their own copies.

You are a nameless character (although you can give yourself a name, such as Bob). You are a bounty hunter who has found a job on the Internet now. Your task is to destroy the droids that have cloned themselves.

 「 D i s c l a i m e r 」

At the moment, this game is only being developed, but we decided to post a demo version of the game. This is a beta alpha omega demo version of the game.

In the future we are going to create

  •  A full story with different endings.
  •  Multiplayer
  •  New items and locations

These are our main goals, you can also help us complement the game.

  All we need is support.
